title: Consumers to get 77 paisa relief in tariff in August: Power Division
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 08 (APP): Ministry of Power Division on Thursday said that the consumers would get 77 paisa relief in tariff in the billing month of August as compared to July.
The National Electric Power Regulatory Authority (NEPRA) issued notification into fuel adjustment cost (FCA) for June, the statement said.
The FCA for July was Rs 3.33 per unit, it further said. The FCA for August would further reduce to Rs 2.56 per unit in the billing month of August, it said.
